file_content.text: Havoc? Hey there--we just wanted to thank you for springing us.
No time for introductions before. I'm Major Fel, Eighty-second Armored. I always wanted to meet the head of Havoc--this is a real honor.
I'm glad I could get you and your people out of there.
Good to meet you, too.
I can hardly believe it's over. Everything happened so fast.
Are your people going to be alright?
How's everyone holding up?
I think so. The Imps weren't easy on us, but that's all over now.
I guess you found us on account of Jaxo. Is she over there? I'd like to thank her, too, if I could.
I need to report to my CO. Did you need something?
No time for chat.
Oh. Apologies--I didn't mean to get in your way.
Before I go, would you pass our thanks on to Sergeant Jaxo, too? She rode out with you, right?
Unfortunately, Jaxo was killed during the escape.
Jaxo didn't make it.
Oh. I'm sorry, I didn't realize.
Jaxo gave her life so the rest of you could escape.
She had to sacrifice herself.
Oh. We knew she was calling for help, but... we had no idea.
She should get a medal. Jaxo went way beyond the call of duty, here. We'd all be dead if not for her.
I had to choose between saving all of you, or saving Jaxo.
It was you, or Jaxo.
Oh. I'm sorry, that must have been very hard on you.
She ought to get a medal. We'd never have gotten out if she hadn't slipped away to call for help.
I'll be sure to suggest it to my CO.
I agree.
Thank you. It seems like the least we could do to try and repay her.
My squad and I risked our lives, too.
What about Havoc?
You won't find a man or woman on this ship who doesn't think you all deserve a dozen medals each.
I just want to be sure we honor Jaxo's work, too. She deserves it.
Jaxo is no hero. She wanted me to save her instead of you.
She wanted me to let you die!
What? No, I... no. That can't be right.
Maybe she did, but that was the stress talking, not Jaxo. She went through a lot on A-77. We all did.
She still risked her life to save us, just like you. She's a hero, no matter what.
We couldn't expect anyone to think clearly in that position.
I guess you're right.
Exactly. Remember her the way she really was--we owe her that much.
If that's what you want to think, go for it.
Whatever you say.
I will, because it's a fact.
Jaxo should've been proud to give up her life.
You're wrong.
We all like to think we'll be brave, at the end. It's just lucky that a lot of us never have to find out.
I won't hold you up any longer--thanks again, Major. From all of us. Fel out.
Havoc Squad! We owe you big time, Major. Everyone's on the transport and accounted for--we're good to go!
